Description: This CloudFormation Template deploys a complete Microsoft HPC Pack environment. **WARNING** This template creates Amazon EC2 instances, AWS Lambda Functions, and other resources. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.

SnapshotName.Description: 'Name' tag of the snapshot containing the Microsoft HPC Pack installation package

RDPLocation.Description: Lockdown RDP access to the bastion host (default can be accessed from anywhere)
RDPLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

VPCCIDR.Description: CIDR Block for the entire VPC
VPCCIDR.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

BastionAdminPassword.Description: Password for the Administrator account of the Bastion host. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

HPCUserPassword.Description: Password for the HPC User account. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

AdministratorPassword.Description: Password for the Domain Administrator account. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

RestoreModePassword.Description: Password for a separate Administrator account when the domain controller is in Restore Mode. Must be at least 8 characters containing letters, numbers and symbols

HeadNodeInstanceType.Description: Instance type to use for the Head Node Instance

ComputeNodeInstanceType.Description: Instance type to use for the Compute Node Instance

ClusterPlacementGroup.Description: Name of an existing placement group for the cluster nodes (no placement group if empty)

ComputeNodeInstanceCount.Description: Number of compute nodes to start initially

ComputeNodeInstanceMaxCount.Description: Maximum number of compute nodes to start

Bastion.Description: IP Address of the bastion host
